# Grammars, dictionaries and other sources

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE)

library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
library(RefManageR)
bib <- ReadBib(file = "data/bibliography.bib") 
```


```{r}
readxl::read_xlsx("data/biblib.xlsx", sheet = "source type and idiom")  %>%
  rowwise() %>% 
  mutate(source = Cite(bib, bibtexkey),
         language = factor(language),
         idiom = factor(idiom),
         source_type = factor(source_type)) %>% 
  select(language, idiom, source, source_type) %>% 
  rename(`source type` = source_type) %>% 
  DT::datatable(filter = 'top', 
                escape = FALSE, 
                rownames = FALSE,
                options = list(
                pageLength = 100, 
                autoWidth = TRUE,
                dom = 'fltpi'))
```

## References

```{r, results='asis'}
PrintBibliography(bib)
```
